title: 如何让这条指令检测手持名为冲锋枪的钻石马铠？
author: m050131
txt_content:
版本1.11.2
/scoreboard players set @a withgun 3 {SelectedItem:{id:"minecraft:diamond_horse_armor",Count:1b}}
如何让这条指令检测手持名为冲锋枪的钻石马铠？
也就是，怎么在{SelectedItem:{id:"minecraft:diamond_horse_armor",Count:1b}}中加上物品名字？

replies.author: SPGoding
replies.txt_content:
scoreboard players set @a withgun 3 {SelectedItem:{id:"minecraft:diamond_horse_armor",Count:1b,tag:{display:{Name:"冲锋枪"}}}}
【为不使用testfor点赞

replies.author: m050131
replies.txt_content: 在线等，急。做简易的命令方块枪战ing……

replies.author: ⊙v⊙
m050131
replies.txt_content:
SPGoding 发表于 2018-6-13 18:30
scoreboard players set @a withgun 3 {SelectedItem:{id:"minecraft:diamond_horse_armor",Count:1b,tag:{ ...
，因为我在做多人枪战，，，所以说……testfor并不是我的菜

replies.author: m050131
replies.txt_content:
⊙v⊙ 发表于 2018-6-13 18:50
在SelectedItem里面的那个{ }括号内加上 tag:{}
而tag这个标签里面写的就是give后面那个{ }里的内容...
也谢谢你！
